p: In order to understand the biological themes within the global gene expression changes in relation to BP, we performed gene set enrichment analysis[ 29] to test for enrichment of any gene ontology (GO) biology process[ 30] or KEGG pathways[ 31]. “Metric for ranking gene” parameters were configured to the beta value of the meta-analysis, in order to look at the top enriched functions for BP associated up-regulated and down-regulated gene expression changes respectively. One thousand random permutations were conducted and the significance level was set at FDR≤ 0.25 to allow for exploratory discovery [ 29].
